EmailTemplate.name: Test CC
EmailTemplate.subject: testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Team,
Please can you assist with below document inclusion and advise at your earliest convenience?
Below you will find subscription details:
Call Details Customer care â€“ Please copy Account Manager IHS Markit Case ID {!Case.CaseNumber} IHS Markit Case Owner {!Case.OwnerFullName} Company Name {!Case.Account} IHS Markit Syst. Account Customer Name {!Case.Contact} Subscription Details Supplement details (please be precise on the required BS Supplement) Date Call/Case received {!Case.CreatedDate} Document Number Document Title Request from Customer Additional Info from Customer Care i.e. PM call response Date response sent to Customer Care Any follow up required?
Looking forward to your response. Best regards,
